website_summaries.verdict: A removable, padded floor makes this teepee comfortable for sitting and easier to clean.
pros: Cotton tent with removable padded floor
Window for air circulation and supervision
Room for more than one child, with 4-foot square base and 5-foot tall height
Comes with carrying bag and string lights
cons: Some legs and connectors don't match well, causing balance challenges

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this Teepee!!
customer_reviews.text: This white teepee is absolutely stunning in person! It was so easy to assemble, that my 9 year old son actually put the whole thing together using the directions provided with no help from me!! My younger daughters love playing in the tent together with plenty of room for cozy pillows and blankets too. I strung lights on our teepee to add a little bit of sparkle while the girls played in the evening.The tent is surprisingly sturdy and I would highly recommend this teepee to anyone because the quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable teepee ever!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is wonderful! It is perfect for a playroom or for outdoors. It seems to be made very well - very sturdy canvas. It is a very good size, can fit a few children or one baby and one adult. The white color is beautiful, and can be decorated however you like. There is a cut out on one side to serve as a window, and there is a slot on the inside that could hold books. It was very easy to assemble, took only about 5-10 minutes. My 10 month old daughter absolutely LOVES it! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris + Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easily assembled, plenty of space to play.
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is of excellent quality material and is so cute! It has great details with the window and is gender neutral. It comes with a removable bottom piece of canvas that can be used to create a bottom, or doesn’t have to be attached. My kids love this teepee and there is plenty of room for them to play inside. The price is great and assembly was easy and quick. Would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, great quality and you can't beat the price. I did a ton of research and decided to go with Tiny Land. It didn't disappoint. The teepee is adorable and high quality. I recommend steaming it so that the wrinkles go away. Top Notch.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Neverland Teepee
customer_reviews.text: This teepee was so incredibly simple to assemble. It came perfectly wrapped and even has a cute little carrying case! The material is nice and thick and very high quality. We plan to use this for my son’s Peter Pan theme first birthday party but it also looks perfect in his Neverland nursery! We have moved it all around the house playing in it. Love, love, love! So versatile and fun and it looks cute, so bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Dinter

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The item looks ok but the package came damaged and without the plastic white connectors. There was no instructions as well but it seems quite easy to assembly as long as you have the part. Contacted the seller and waiting for a reply. I would give 1 star but the product actually seems well made. I will change the review to 5 stars if I get the parts. Update: Spare parts received. Excellent customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chris737

customer_reviews.title: Great play area
customer_reviews.text: We bought this teepee for our daughter to have in the play area in the living room. It was easy to assemble and had nstruction paper that came with the package. The dowel and fabric looks and feels well made- something that would last us a while! We love that the teepee is large enough for more than 1 kid and she and her cousins can be in the teepee at the same time. It has room for all her dolls too. We are very satisfied with our purchase. My daughter enjoys her teepee and plays inside for a good while! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Jr

customer_reviews.title: T E R R I B L E !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The canvas itself is a nice thickness but that is all the good I’m saying about this tent. It is extremely difficult putting the sticks together that are joined midway with a plastic tube. The wood stick is wider than the plastic tubing, if you will, and so much force is needed to push each wood stick (8 times) through the plastic. After all the work of putting the wood sticks together and erecting the tent, it would not stay open and it was not level. Why does this tent have a carry case? It doesn't make sense that it is portable if you cannot take apart the wood sticks from the plastic tubes once you first build it!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Teepee
customer_reviews.text: We love this teepee! It’s perfect for a cozy reading nook, outside hideout, movie zone, or a special lunch spot. Very easy to assemble/disassemble, cleaning is a breeze, the window on the side is just adorable, ties on both sides to keep the door open, travel bag included, and let’s be honest, it adds so much to our playroom. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Benner

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this teepee!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this teepee!! The setup was beyond easy and the materials it’s made out of re so sturdy. I love being able to decorate it because of its simplicity but the cute details of the windows and the wood poles are so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Could be better...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 22mo based on the great reviews and the non-toxic fabric. When it arrived the instructions were far from clear, it took about 15 minutes to put together and it is not as sturdy as the pbkids tent. My biggest complaint is the chemical smell! I sat it in for one board book before I was dizzy and felt nauseous. It looks cute but I would not recommend if you are looking for something substantial to hold up to regular use. Our toddler has pulled it down/fallen down twice in the 20 minutes it was used.
customer_reviews.author: pharmamama

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: While I DO see the quality in this product, I am here to tell you that it’s near impossible to keep set up in a nice angle. If you pull one leg in, another comes flinging in with it. It’s literally impossible to keep it nice and straight. You could maybe glue it to the floor but who wants to do that?
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teepee tent for kids to play
customer_reviews.text: Seriously so great! I've been looking for a white teepee tent for my kids for weeks. There are sooooo many beautiful colors and patterns. Ultimately, the white teepee from tinyland comes and stands in our living room. I think I’ve made a right decision! Very nice teepee with great canvas and finished poles. Super good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. My daughter loves it. It moves a little too easily. Would have liked it to be a little sturdier. If I try to open it up all the way with the front two legs, the back two legs will move, and it's a viscous cycle. I have it on hardwood, so maybe if it were on a rug it wouldn't move as easily. Otherwise, nice quality cloth and my daughter favorite is window and a pocket to store toys inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Retuned the next day !
customer_reviews.text: Ok let’s start with it took me couple of hrs to put it together. It didn’t come with instructions! Shocking . Second , the moment i set all up my kids broke the light wire . The box to put batteries in was so hard to open so I have to use a knife . Then the whole entire time tent keep collapsing and collapsing. There is not support bye the poles in the groups so tent was a disaster. Retuned in next day . This tent is not worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: andrea Mejtova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble! It did not come with instructions, but YouTube had an easy tutorial to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Abells29

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teepee
customer_reviews.text: Perfect teepee! My 10 and 8 year old daughters were able to put this together by themselves. They love spending time in it reading books. Great quality. I haven't washed it yet but I definitely wouldn't use hot water or dry it to avoid shrinkage. Looks beautiful. Added banner ribbons for added decor.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so cute
customer_reviews.text: This tepee is amazing. We were looking at this one versus some more expensive ones on Amazon, and went with this one because it was cheaper, came with a pad for the floor and had string lights. AMAZING. The canvas is just the perfect thickness— isn’t thin and flimsy but also not too thick where it gets the air inside overheated. Color is a beautiful off-white/cream and the little lights are such a nice touch. The pad it comes with is also good and even has non-slip tracking on the bottom. Save yourselves the money from the more expensive ones and get this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a teepee tent this is the one. The material is amazing and sturdy love that it comes with its own mat my daughters are in love with it and the two of them can fit inside pretty comfortably. I can’t wait to to use for a photoshoot with my girls
customer_reviews.author: Esra, Burak and BABY melissa's reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not for small children!
customer_reviews.text: Nice teepee but the lights would not be good for younger children where you place the batteries has many openings and easy to remove the cover so if for any reason battery acid were leaking a little and your child found a way to reach this they would not be protected they would get burned or could easily pull the batteries out to chew on them etc! So if you have a young child keep them out of reach!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica & Devin

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe, Always Falling
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when our oldest was a baby. I wonder if some of the positive reviews are paid, or if they just have very gentle children. Once he started toddling around, he would knock this over about once a week, so we took it down. We decided to set it up again now that we have two kids ages 1 and 3. They absolutely love it, but i’s only a matter of minutes before they knock it down. The wooden poles are not light, so this is a fairly dangerous hazard.
customer_reviews.author: ipr151

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy, plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our kids at their gender reveal. The soon to be parents loved it!! And it added to the theme of the party. It was easy to figure out how it went together. The only difficulty were the polls sliding into the black connectors. They were difficult to put in, we used a rubber mallet. And then we couldn’t separate them when taking down. The good news is it’s very sturdy and everything else fits nicely in the bag. The fabric is also heavy quality. We are so pleased with everything!!! All the guests complimented it!!! Niw its in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Oak&Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and just buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around on Amazon for the best teepee and I believe I found it. This teepee from Tiny Land is so easy to assemble and made of durable, quality materials. It is also large enough for an adult and a child to sit in together and read, or for a child to lay in and hang out. I especially love that it comes with a bottom piece, which many other teepee/tents do not come with. I also love that it comes with a string of star lights and carrying/storage bag. I highly recommend this teepee!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the teepee
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old loves the teepee at the first sight and has been playing with it for hours. She puts all her stuffed animals in and pretends it’s their home. She also takes her book to read in it. The fabric is thick and washed nicely in the washer. Since it is white, it blends in our living room nicely without adding another color. Also it is easy to decorate for any occasion. Overall I am very happy with this purchase and see my daughter playing with it in many coming years.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The teepee material is a thick, ivory colored canvas. The material from other sellers on amazon looked flimsy so I’m happy I went with this one. It came with star string lights, which I didn’t set up (not my style) and a white blanket. Setup wasn’t as easy as it should be. The string you weave through the holes and tie around the top could have been easier or explained better. Overall, very happy with the purchase and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kalan

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Teepee!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this teepee for my granddaughter's first birthday. I had a little trouble putting it together (instructions are all pictures, no text) but eventually figured it out. Once together, it's super sturdy and really cute! The pad on the bottom is no-slip which is nice but it isn't super thick so I bought a fluffy throw rug to put on top. My granddaughter was a bit hesitant about it at first but now loves it! She fascinated with the fairy lights. Great product. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Paticoff

customer_reviews.title: Very charming teepee tent!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Pretty darn sturdy. The material is heavy duty and won’t be ripping with normal wear and tear. I love the rubber stoppers on the bottom of the wooden pegs to help preserve the floors. There is a window and a little side pocket on the inside, which is super cute, and a beautiful addition. Cons: It’s a little big. Not abnormal size or anything it’s just awkward to place in a room. Bottom line: I love it, my kids love it. Super glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Trista | FindingOurNextAdventure

customer_reviews.title: As shown on website
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Super easy to assemble and really like that it comes with a case and lights. The color is perfect for what we have in my daughter’s room. You can even make it smaller by putting the poles closer together. My daughter also loves playing pick-a-boo on the little window. It comes with its own mat, but the pictures I uploaded show an Alpaca rug that we put on top of the original mat because that’s what I wanted to have with the teepee for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mi Vill

customer_reviews.title: Poles do not fit plastic connectors
customer_reviews.text: One wooden pole broke while trying to assemble. The poles do not fit into the connectors easily. We had to force them together and now we can't pull it apart to return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, excellent purchase.  LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter for Christmas this year (2016). She absolutely loves it. It became 'her' space. We read books in there and got lots of pictures. I know it'll be a good place for shade in the summer, too. It's good quality materials and very easy to set up. The little window is an extra bonus. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading description- no padded floor
customer_reviews.text: Description is very misleading as there was no padded mat. There was a piece for the floor made of the same material as the rest of the teepee and no where close to what the picture depicts. Cardboard offers more cushioning. Reading other reviews, it seems that we're not the only ones who bought this because of the padded mat to be misled with what was shipped. So obviously not an isolated mistake. Setup was quick and easy. Legs can slide fairly easily on our carpeted room, even with the rubber caps on bottom of the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is adorable! Well quality materials and big! I can fit 16 foam mat tiles on the inside of it! My 2 year old loves it and I’m sure he will love it for years to come. It’s big enough that he will be able to use it when he is older. It was super easy to put together and assemble. The material is a nice thick canvas and the wooden poles are actual wood! I’m very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: chelseanoel03

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, beautiful Teepee
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I was weary to buy a cheaper teepee on amazon given I’ve been burned from previous purchases that did not hold up or were cheaply made. But this teepee is sturdy with real canvas (in ivory color). It took about 5 minutes to put together and came with a non slip pad and battery powered star lights. Feels sturdy and looks gorgeous, just like the crate and kids or PB teepees but for 1/3 price.
customer_reviews.author: DanieDD

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Giving a 3 stars because there’s no bottom to the teepee. The bottom piece came as a mat and was not attached to the actual teepee. So All the pillows we placed against the teepee fell out, which was a bit irritating. Will have to find a way to sew the mat to the teepee.
customer_reviews.author: Thtgrlsvna

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, nice product....but
customer_reviews.text: Claimed it was a white canvas, but came with pink stripes, fortunately we have a daughter so it worked out, but if it had been for a boy we would have had to return it. Also claimed it came with a matt, which was the main reason I picked this brand over others, but it did not come with a matt. Quality seems nice, but I am a little disappointed with this purchase for the misleading information. *** Update*** I just updated my rating from 2 to a 4, the company stepped up and fixed the problem even though I didn't ask them to I was very happy with them for being proactive and facing my issues, thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect TeePee Tent!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful TeePee Tent! The cute little window on the side and the string of lights adds the perfect touch! The size is much larger than I expected, which is a bonus! My daughter loves to bring her toys inside and play. We also, love reading books inside of the tent. I love that the material is 100% cotton. The tent comes with a carrying bag, as well. It was fairly easy to assemble and didn't take too long to do so. We will be using this for years to come and are very pleased with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: So roomie!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been wanting a teepee for our daughter forever and after pouring over reviews we found this one and couldn’t be happier! I set it up in seriously like 5 minutes. It’s huge! As you can see from my 6’ 3” Husband sitting comfortably inside . I even crawled in there and we can all lay down and read. It came with a carrying case so you can take it outside the photo shoot’s and such it also came with a detachable bottom. We chose to leave it off so we could have the pink fuzzy rug but you can put it back on To keep spills from little ones of your carpet lol
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: If purchasing a warehouse deal, please know the descriptions are NOT accurate. Purchased one that just said box might be damaged. However it was missing the padding, lights and carrying case. Wouldn’t have purchased for $50 without these items. Tent instructions were small, grainy photos and no text to help ensure a firm install. My child was able to push on the sides and collapsed the entire tent. She is 16months. Since I can’t get the missing items from amazon, I’m returning the entire thing and will find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jackalyn Kovac

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! I use it for my photography sessions!
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces were there and it wasn't to bad to set up. It came with a case but that is if you plan to take apart when you move it other wise it won't fit. It would be nice if it did come with a carry case twice the size so you could easily carry it around whole because no one is gonna want to take it apart just to put it back together. The pieces were not super easy to push together. But over all its a nice white teepee! Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Haley L.

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The teepee exceeded my expectations, it was supper easy to assemble and the quality is great!! My daughter loves the pouch that’s inside, she keeps her books in there so I can read to her. It’s a great way to interact with your little ones and have fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute teepee but unfortunately it’s not sturdy and difficult to assemble. Each wooden piece is actually two pieces connected by a plastic connector. However the wood doesn’t fit all the way into the connectors, leaving it unsturdy. I’m anticipating this snapping in two the second my toddler puts any weight on it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: The teepee that won’t disappoint you!
customer_reviews.text: I love this teepee! I love how you can really open it up and how perfectly it fits in small room but very spacious when you are in it. It comes with a padded floor mat that is perfect with wood floors and the tiny little window is just adorable! The material feels very durable and can withstand children messes. I wish I could give this more stars because it deserves it! Also setting it up was so easy! My two year old even helped! We just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey lesser

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted teepee for baby so bad for his Montessori's floor bed! I carefully order this after reading reviews plus seeing some picture and I am so glad with what I received! Very easy to assemble, the instructions come with picture so that’s a plus since I am very visual. The teepee looks made of good quality materials, very steady. My baby really enjoys it so that is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Molina

customer_reviews.title: SUCH GREAT QUALITY FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this teepee!! This thing is huge!! My husband could sit in it with my two littles pretty comfortably. The window and pocket are adorable. It even comes with a cute storage bag which I love, easy to setup, very thick durable canvas, poles seem very good quality, and you can throw the canvas in the wash if it gets dirty! These things on Etsy usually go for a lot more so it’s so worth the price!! Highly recommend! My kids LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Clean Living Mom | Meredith Chandler

customer_reviews.title: This TeePee is a fabulous product that kids will love!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this Teepee is amazing! This is super easy to put together, the material is high quality, and it has a super convenient carry case! The best part is, all three of my kiddos love it of varying ages! My daughter had so much fun filling it and making it her own little special area! They love to go in there and read books! It’s quite spacious as my 6 year old can stand up in there easily. I love the color as it goes with everything! It matches perfectly in my daughters room! I am very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jumrukovski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect present for my 2 year olds birthday. It is wonderful quality and the size is tall and wife enough to fit me and my two year old girl. We have spent some time reading books and the star lights are and extra cute touch. It is easy to assemble and easy to close up and move to another room if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Preston J.

customer_reviews.title: Ok teepee
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for my niece the cushion which I upgraded in order to receive is thin like an infant newborn mattress pad it is not how pictured as a thick blanket lights are thin we purchased month in advance for my Neices day Because of quarantine to only open it a couple weeks later and see if $25 cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Andrea T. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: We love this teepee!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Teepee! It came with detailed directions and a cute little travel bag. The parts were all very high quality and it was easy to assemble. I was really surprised at how roomy it was it fit all 3 of my kids in it. I purchased this Teepee for tea party photos and indoor play! This Teepee is too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy lee

customer_reviews.title: 19 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this teepee! The material is thick and any wrinkles from being packaged steamed out easily. I love the light pine poles and they have caps on the ends to keep them from slipping. My daughter LOVES the window! There’s a pocket for books etc too. It’s small enough that my daughter feels secure and loves to play in it but also big enough that we can read to her in it too! I think this will entertain her for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Leigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this tent for your little one!! I had another tent that broke within 24 hours. I kept looking and looking and it was worth the wait. The price for this product is unbelievable!!! Wonderful material and incredibly sturdy. Took 10 minutes tops to get it all put together. I would absolutely purchase again for myself or a gift. Is perfect for a newborn to adolescent. I’m 5’0 and fit perfectly in the tent with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: KeanKa

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My 3 year old and myself can fit comfortably (But definitely made for kids). It was so easy to assemble. I did it in under 10 mins. The mat it came with is thin so i definitely recommend an additional carpet if you’re putting it on hard wood floor. Everything pictured (except for the frozen toy) is from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tent. Came inside out and pole broke. Won’t fit in house it’s so huge.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric arrived inside out.... fine, I should have double checked it was right so I’ll give them that.. but then went to put it together again the correct way, and the wood snapped in half. Fool me once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me. Warning: this thing is 6’ tall. I did not pay attention in the ordering process to account for it’s size. It’s Christmas Eve and this whole ordeal has me pissed.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Simple, High Quality Canvas Tent
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is exactly what I was hoping for. The canvas is high quality and poles are sturdy. It is a perfect blank canvas to add to our sunroom turned playroom. It does move around a bit when our son plays inside, because it is on a hardwood floor – I imagine it would be more stable on a rug. We might purchase a small area rug for that reason + to add more cushion underneath it. But the tent itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Young

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not great but tent is fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions weren’t the easiest - only photos. I couldn’t figure out the correct way to thread the string through the poles and teepee, this have trouble having it stand perfectly open. The tent itself is nice and sturdy. I appreciated that it comes with a mat and it was a nice surprise to come with twinkle star lights too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this teepee! It was really easy to put together, as well as move room to room. My son loved it as soon as I got it up. We bring it room to room depending on where he wants to play. I can even go in there with him and have night story time. I love the material it is made out of. We got some decor to make it personable for my son, and he loved that. I would def recommend this to anyone who has a child that loves to have a place of their own to play.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality so far. Very easy to set up. Cute little window and pocket detail. My avg size 7yr old fits in it just fine to play his legos.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn L

customer_reviews.title: Good solid tent
customer_reviews.text: Good little tent. The tent is made of sturdy and solid materials. Assembly was relatively easy, though I had a hard time pushing the wooden rods into the plastics connector pieces. I had to thump the rods on the ground fairly hard many times to get them into the plastic connectors. I don’t believe that I would be able to disassemble the connected rods, which means the tent isn’t likely be to very portal. Otherwise, I think my kids will really like the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Aperr

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice material and the poles are nice and smooth durable but you Do have to adjust them here and there because the tent doesnt stay tight far as the material i think this might be with all of them though otherwise id give it 5stars Lights are cute mat isnt thick but that was expected
customer_reviews.author: Burney

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 1 and he loves it. He discovered a window and peeks out from it with laughter. He carries his stuffed toys into his teepee and cuddles with them. Definitely a nice addition to his room. It is very well made and I feel safe about my 1 year old playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful teepee
customer_reviews.text: We are so in love with this tee pee. My two year old and five year old just can’t get enough of playing with it. The material is perfect and so sturdy. It’s the perfect touch to our daughters room. It was so easy to put together. Delivery was so fast I would definitely recommend this tee pee to any parent. Your kids will absolutely love it. It’s great also for photography purposes as well as just decoration or an adddition to your children’s bedroom. Super cute and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo amazed how easy this was to set up!!! It’s super adorable and I’m able to put my kids toys in here on the sides with enough room for them to still play in! I was looking for something bigger and actually durable this is it! We have been through so many play tents and I’m happy I finally found one!
customer_reviews.author: Kara squires

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy
customer_reviews.text: Wow it’s beautiful and easy to put together. Took under 10 min. It’s fresh and can fit two toddlers Love it. It comes with a white pad for softness and the star lights. I bought the flowers and the pillows and the rug from amazing to make it more girly
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: This tee pee is the bomb!!! It’s very quality sturdy material and it’s super cute. If I could design a dream tee pee it’s this one! We got the LED lights and the flags as accessories and it’s just so cute I can’t even. It’s very roomy too! My kids (3 and 6) are sitting in there with plenty of space. I sat comfortably in there too!! I very highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great fort area for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My girls absolutely love their new teepee! They enjoy reading in it with several of their babies and blankets and I've even caught them both sleeping in it instead of their beds. It was put together in seconds and comes with the cutest travel bag. It's a nice thick fabric and the cute window is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my dog so she has her own space. It’s a great size for her, and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great teepee, easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this teepee. It’s so cute when set up and seems very well made. I was a little confused with how to put it together at first and do think the instructions it comes with could be a little clearer, but once I looked up a video it was very simple to figure out. The material seems very durable of the tenet itself. I love the little window in the teepee it is such a cute extra touch! The color is nice and neutral and goes well with our house. Our little one has already been enjoying crawling in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Such a perfect teepee for babies birthday party!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this adorable teepee for our babies cake smashing photoshoot, at his birthday party and now it's in our living room where he plays peekaboo in it everyday! He loves it so much! And we love how durable it is! It's also aesthetically really pretty and decorates any setting. I've seen a lot of teepees around nowadays but the quality of this one is so great that I would recommend this one over any of the others hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Oliferovskiy

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable. Hang dry.
customer_reviews.text: Set this up outside for bday decoration and turned out well. I just used some oxy clean spray on some grass/outdoor stains and came out clean again. Hung to dry. It’s pretty big so about 3 toddlers can fit in there quite nicely. Would have put 5 stars but soon after I ordered it, price went down by $10! 😐
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Cutest teepee and well made
customer_reviews.text: This teepee is SO adorable! I love that it is a white canvas fabric, it is so easy to dress it up for a little girl or a little boy. It took me less than 5 minutes to assemble it. It’s perfect for carpeted areas or wood because it comes with non slip grips for the ends! The canvas is really well-made and the post fit together so easily. My daughter thinks it’s her new bed and wants to sleep in it she loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha K

customer_reviews.title: Little girl's dream space!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo darling!! My grand daughter loves this tippee. The lights just add that little magic. Easy set up, easy wash!! Takes up a corner of the room. She fills it up with her soft toys and chair....xx worth every penny!! My grand daughter is under a year old!! Smiles all around.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee was exactly what I was hoping it would be. The fabric is nice and thick so it won't easily tear. The setup took a few minutes. There are no written instructions, just pictures but super easy to follow. My kids love it, therefore, I love it! Only thing a buyer should be aware of is the "thick" mat they are promoting with it. It is neither thick nor non-slip... it's just a thin piece of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: The cutest teepee!
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this! I’ve been dying to get my 3 year old son a teepee and knew this one was perfect! We have another little one on the way so this is his special spot that will be just his. He calls it his ‘house’. It’s very sturdy, made of a great canvas material, and very easy to put together! We couldn’t be more pleased with this product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Your kids will love it 😍
customer_reviews.text: It gave the final touch to his room! I absolutely love it... he enjoys taking naps in his teepee ⛺️... I didn’t think he would enjoy it like his does, worth every penny! Easy to assemble and material is good quality✨
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this teepee tent! All though it’s for my 1 year old it also fits my 5/7 year old just fine ! I did struggle with tying the sticks together but worked it’s self out soon enough! I would recommend this to other and the price isn’t bad either
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo S.

customer_reviews.title: Direction with & without lites
customer_reviews.text: I liked - I didn’t receive the sash that’s at the top in the pictures and the lites had to be ordered separate and I only received 3 Strands of lites but I have 4 poles. That didn’t make sense. Instructions could have been better. Like I put it together, like the pictures showed that came with it, but when I was trying to put the lites on it, I had to take back down the teepee to insert lites in the hole for the poles first, you can’t do it after you inserted the poles- to tight. But after all that - it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Green

customer_reviews.title: Adorable nice quality teepee!
customer_reviews.text: Love this teepee! Easy to put in and my daughter loves playing in it. Easy to adjust size so doesn’t have to be too big for a room. Looks great with or without the bottom that they provide. :) (first picture with the bottom in and second picture without it in)
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Robowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Thoughtfully Crafted..
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and easy to build. The canvas and birch wood were so thoughtfully crafted to create this beautiful teepee. It is very much a quality product. It also comes with strings lights, a carrier, and a pad! It has everything to start playtime right away. We love it so much and goes so well with our daughter’s forest themed room 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good canvas play tent
customer_reviews.text: Really glad it was canvas like I wanted and also a true white, not cream. The window is cute. The lights were an exciting touch for my 3-year-old. Tying it up wasn’t the best on my first try, but I’m sure I’ll figure out how to make it better. Visually lovely appealing; happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Best teepee ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love this teepee! It’s made of such great material, easy to assemble and looks super cute! My kids really enjoy playing in it! This teepee would make a perfect gift!! My favorite part is that it includes a floor and rubber ends so the wood does not scratch your floor. It’s a really great teepee and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy- daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10 minutes to set up and looks SO perfect in my daughter's room! I loved the lights with it, super cute! My daughter instantly crawled over and spent the entire afternoon inside, just having a blast! Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Clari Noel

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, my 2 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my 2 year old somewhere that he could have all of his favorites, a space of his own. He loves it! It's easy to put together, even with a toddler hanging on you. It comes with a mat & faerie lights too!
customer_reviews.author: Blw_meals

customer_reviews.title: Lights don't turn off??
customer_reviews.text: The material quality is fine but I agree with other reviewers that the poles are difficult to assemble with the plastic connectors. The bigger problem is that lights don't turn off! It has three switch settings - one is a steady on and the other two are blinking. The battery box is very cheap and flimsy. Too inconvenient to remove batteries in order to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: MPR1961

customer_reviews.title: Tiny land US Teepee - AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this teepee is AMAZING!!! Super easy to assemble & accurate description! The packaging is so cute too! Also, the item is well protected so it does not get damaged through delivery. We just can’t express how happy we are with this product. They even provide clear caps for the end of each wood leg piece
customer_reviews.author: Mario Obando

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice Teepee but didn't include the mat or lights as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Celje

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! The most perfect teepee!!!
customer_reviews.text: This teepee tent is amazing! We have been looking for one for our daughter for a while but wanted one simple and aesthetically pleasing! This tent is BEAUTIFUL! It goes with any type of decor and it just looks so beautiful in her room. We even took it outside to shade her while she played! I recommend this to anyone looking to find an adorable gift or just an extra play area for their child!
customer_reviews.author: Adam carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tent! It's such great quality and easy to assemble. I love that it's a fabric material so it can be washed as needed. Also this tent comes with a convenient travel bag for nights at grandparents house. My kids will be loving this for years!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with thick canvas material, pockets for the poles, gromets to tie the canvas to the poles, etc. It's easy to put together (5 minutes tops). And my son loves it! I love the extra touches like the star lights, carrying bag and mat included with the teepee too. Very happy I went with this one! (I decorated it with a cute bunting I found on Etsy to match the room decor too!)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Canvas seems to be thick and of good quality. Seams around opening and window are clean, well done and not cheap looking. The little string light is a cute touch as well. The quilted floor pad/mat that comes with it is pretty thin, so additional throw pillows or another blanket would make it more comfortable, but may not phase the littles (speaking for myself when I crawled in.) :) Overall, I’m very pleased with this purchase, it’s a great buy at this price. Glad I didn’t splurge on PB or another big name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsy Shofner

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. WRONG ITEM DELIVERED.
customer_reviews.text: SO DISAPPOINTED I recieved the wrong item. I Ordered Teepee Tent with Padded Mat & Light String& Carry Case- Kids Foldable Play Tent for Indoor Outdoor, Raw White Canvas Teepee Instead i got Tiny Land Kids Teepee Tent for Boys, Black and White Stripe Children Play Tent with Canvas Carry Case for Indoor & Garden. This comes Without the padded mat & lights & the tent is a totally different color. I was so looking forward to gifting my daughter this item and now i have a completely different teepee to the one she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Godoy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tent for your littles
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute tent! It was so easy to set up and it is very sturdy! My daughter is obsessed with the tent. She loves reading her books inside with her dollies. I definitely recommend this tent for your littles. It'll make the perfect Christmas gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: My kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: I love the neutral color. Very affordable, I liked the window so my kids can see me as they are in there. There’s also a little pocket on the interior to store toys. The mat included was also a plus for us. The wooden dowels are so sturdy. It also included non slip grips for the dowels. Don’t have to worry about it moving out of place. Definitely looking at a second teepee for my other kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this teepee because I knew the plain white color would look great in my daughter's nursery. It was really easy to put together, and didn't take very long. The wooden pegs can fall out of the plastic connectors when moving from room to room, but otherwise it's been exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiding space!
customer_reviews.text: My son and our cat love it! We redecorated my son's bedroom into a Minecraft theme and this tent serves as his Minecraft tent. Super cute, he's 6 and has plenty of room to play in it, sit and read and even to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly as pictured and described. Great quality. My 18 month old is not gentle with it and it has held up quite well. She loves the little pocket and the window. And mom and dad love the look of it with the lights. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Huge + BEAUTIFUL + GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This Teepee is truly as portrayed in the advertising photos or even better in person. I wasn’t disappointed when I open it and I love how the instructions included are so easy so follow. The material seems to have durability and it’s definitely worth the price! It’s perfect for children to play or photography. Very beautiful and huge. I recommend buying this and will be buying more in the future. This is a company you can trust on! I’m a photographer so I will be using this for a lot of my sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jazmin Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My children received a teepee for Christmas that looked very similar to this one, and it broke the first day, so I ordered this. It has much thicker poles and the connectors are a lot better. The delivery person left the package by my gate and the dogs chewed it up. I emailed the company and they sent all the replacement parts free! They got here super fast and I was so surprised! The teepee has been great and it is surviving two very active little boys. Couldn’t be happier with our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Martin

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this! I ordered it for my daughter's 1st birthday photos. The height and size was perfect. Although it can break down to travel, I found it easier to just collapse the legs and put in in the car and go. Now we have it in our living room-it doesn't take up much room at all and is a subtle and cute addition to our decor without being a loud and distracting play area. She plays in it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PREFERABLY FOR 10 and less
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it, I think is better for kids 10 and under since is not so big, a 12 years old can fit there sitting down, is just that it would be nice if it was bigger and the kids could lay down even big kids. We love it, the material is thick and it bright a mat and some twinkle lights.
customer_reviews.author: Nasthenka

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It took about 15 mins to put together. The poles attach but not very well. They fall apart while attached and it’s honestly a pain in the butt. I know it says it mobile but I wouldn’t move it around. It looks nice but I know once my daughter starts moving around more she will knock it right over because it’s not very stable .
customer_reviews.author: Abbygail Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good quality teepee
customer_reviews.text: Just got this teepee and loving the quality and sturdiness of the product! Teepee doesn’t slide and collapse on our wood floors, and the gender neutral color makes it great for use with any future children, and also leaves a great blank canvas to accessorize with colored rugs, throws, and draped accents. We purchased this as a gift for our daughters 1st birthday and we looking forward to many years of reading together and imaginative play. Really happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Kids Teepee Tent with Mat & Light String& Carry Case- Kids Foldable Play Tent for Indoor Outdoor, Raw White Canvas Teepee - Kids Playhouse - Portable Kids Tent
feature_bullets: Come with Mat and Fairy Light

🔔NONSTOP INDOOR OUTDOOR PLAYTENT FUN - Every child loves their very own teepee kids playtent. They can read books, act out the stories in their imagination and play alone, with a friend or sibling. We added a window for good air circulation and the flap door can close with string. Our teepee for kids can be setup either indoor or outdoor. Great for shade in the summer. Kids can enjoy the feeling of privacy and personal space, while parents can monitor them. For children ages 3 and up.

🔔DURABLE, PORTABLE AMUSEMENT FOR KIDS - The Tiny Land design team created an easy- to-assemble lightweight kids play tent.47.2 inches long by 47.2 inches wide, this kids teepee can be made wider or smaller by moving the wood poles closer together or fully apart. Fits into any space and nicely into corners. Ideal for small rooms. Come with carrying bag for disassemble and slip parts into. Both portable and practical, carry your child’s favorite teepee anywhere with you.

🔔MADE WITH NATURAL PREMIUM MATERIALS - Tiny Land’s child play tent is made of 100% natural, non-toxic, unpainted, extra safe, breathable cotton canvas. The tent poles are made of sturdy pine wood and are free of chemical odors and harmful substances. These handmade, 4-sided teepees play tents are made with the highest standards that ensures sturdy long term use. Only the best for your child to sleep or play in, focus on drawing in their coloring books, share secrets or even store their toys.

🔔HAPPY CHILDHOOD MEMORIES - Witness the priceless expression on your child or grandchild’s face when they open their very own kids teepee tent. If you’re looking for the ultimate toy for any child, this teepee canvas tent will win their hearts and creative attention for years of playtime. Highly suggest letting your kids personalize their teepee with water- or oil-based or acrylic paint, stickers or light strands.

🔔MERRYMAKING RECREATION - We at Tiny Land love our outdoor indoor play teepees. Our kids do too! We stand are so certain your child will happily spend hours in their own tent. We are passionate about providing safe, teepees to the kids everywhere so they can run with their imagination in their own special space.
